channel.title: solid-state drives on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in solid-state drives on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Optiarc Logo
Optiarc is a brand of optical disc drives and solid-state drives. It is owned by a US-based Vinpower Digital, Inc. Initially Optiarc was established on April 3, 2006 as a joint venture between Sony and NEC. The company, named Sony NEC Optiarc, focused on manufacturing optical disk drives primarily for the OEM desktop and notebook PC markets. On September 11, 2008, it was announced that Sony would take over NEC’s 45% share, making Optiarc a wholly owned subsidiary of Sony, to be called Sony Optiarc.
You can download theOptiarclogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Optiarc
item.description: Optiarc is a brand of optical disc drives and solid-state drives. It is owned by a US-based Vinpower Digital, Inc. Initially Optiarc was established on April 3, 2006 as a joint venture between Sony and NEC. The company, named Sony NEC Optiarc, focused on manufacturing optical disk drives primarily for the OEM desktop and notebook PC markets. On September 11, 2008, it was announced that Sony would take over NEC’s 45% share, making Optiarc a wholly owned subsidiary of Sony, to be called Sony Optiarc.
